items.name: Moon-touched Silver Sword
items.description: A beautifully crafted silver longsword that glows with a soft moonlight when drawn.
items.properties: +1 to hit and damage against shadow creatures and werewolves, glows in darkness
items.purpose: Combat against supernatural creatures, ceremonial purposes
items.history: Forged by elven smiths during the War of Shadows, passed down through generations of monster hunters
items.activation: Automatically glows when undead or shadow creatures are nearby
items.limitations: Silver is softer than steel, requires special maintenance
